questions.question_text: Which of the following is a key feature of Cisco Data center?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is the correct answer

Selected Answer: B
answer is B, "MultiCloud"
Seamless Multi cloud mobility is the correct answer.

Features of Cisco Data Center include:

Enhanced application performance. Cisco Data Center helps ensure application performance across any device at all locations.
Seamless multicloud mobility. Customers can deploy new applications to all locations within their multicloud domain.
Pervasive security. Protect applications, infrastructure, data, users, and devices with performance visibility and analytics.

choices.C: quick mitigation of threats that breach defences

questions.question_text: What is the Cisco TelePresence IX5200?

choices.C: a state-of-the-art triple screen featuring a dual row of seats for up to 18 people
choices.A: a flexible video-conferencing solution designed for small huddle spaces
choices.B: an intelligent dual-camera speaker tracking solution with two LED screens
choices.D: an advanced all-in-one desktop collaboration solution featuring high-definition video

questions.question_text: Which networks benefit from the consistent enforcement policies enabled by Cisco's approach to security?

choices.D: physical, virtual, and cloud networks only
choices.B: physical, virtual, remote, and cloud networks

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
I choose B by comment of Radu333.

choices.C: a mobile endpoint solution designed to connect teams at any time, in any place
choices.B: a service solution that offers business messaging, calling, and persistent meeting spaces
choices.D: a flexible and scalable platform for video-conferencing rooms
choices.A: all-in-one desktop collaboration device with an intuitive touchscreen

questions.question_text: Which phrase best describes the Cisco DX series?

discussion.content: The Cisco DX Series offers an integrated collaboration device for people who spend a lot of their time collaborating and need an uncompromised experience at their fingertips. These multifunction touchscreen devices provide HD video meetings with Cisco TelePresence® and H.

questions.question_text: Which feature of WebEx Teams allows customers to collaborate on sketches?

discussion.content:
looks like B
Similarly, Cisco Webex Teams includes a whiteboarding tool, allowing team members to sketch out ideas and make notes together in real time from any device.
